brand.name: aiflai
profile.connect_desc: After connecting, aiflai.com will read your booking emails to identify flights, car rentals, hotels, and activities.
profile.forwarding_desc: Forward booking emails to your personal aiflai.com address and we’ll auto-import them.
alert.connect_google: Connect Google: wire this to your OAuth route.
alert.connect_outlook: Connect Outlook: wire this to your OAuth route.
add.post_create_hint: You can now import from your email or forward your bookings to your aiflai address.
